feed.title: GodSVG Blog
feed.link:
https://www.godsvg.com News about GodSVG releases and more
GodSVG's first development build is out!
MewPurPur 2023-12-05T00:00:00Z After months of hard work from me and some contributors, GodSVG is finally usable and all roadblocks to an initial alpha release have been lifted. Time to present it to the world! 1-0-alpha1
New prerelease: GodSVG 1.0-alpha2
MewPurPur 2023-12-21T00:00:00Z After only two weeks, there are already enough new things for a new alpha build. GodSVG is now out for web and MacOS! 1-0-alpha2
New prerelease: GodSVG 1.0-alpha3
MewPurPur 2024-04-18T00:00:00Z After four months of development, I'm proud to present GodSVG's next big step forward, a prerelease with big improvements in all areas. 1-0-alpha3
New prerelease: GodSVG 1.0-alpha4
MewPurPur 2024-06-06T00:00:00Z A new prerelease focused on quality of life, stability, and performance. 1-0-alpha4
New prerelease: GodSVG 1.0-alpha5
MewPurPur 2024-09-01T00:00:00Z This prerelease adds support for gradients, groups, percentages in numeric attributes, and much more. 1-0-alpha5
GodSVG is now available on Itch
MewPurPur 2024-09-02T00:00:00Z Along with the alpha 5 prerelease, GodSVG was officially published on Itch. godsvg-is-now-on-itch
New prerelease: GodSVG 1.0-alpha6
MewPurPur 2024-12-07T00:00:00Z This prerelease focuses on stability, setting the stage for bigger changes in upcoming alphas. 1-0-alpha6
New prerelease: GodSVG 1.0-alpha7
MewPurPur 2025-01-12T00:00:00Z Introducing an experimental Android build, quality of life changes, and stability. 1-0-alpha7
New prerelease: GodSVG 1.0-alpha8
MewPurPur 2025-03-15T00:00:00Z This prerelease implements tabs, improves performance, and delivers an insane number of bugfixes! 1-0-alpha8
